Items.Title: Oversight - The sudden increase of homeowner policy terminations in coastal areas of New York City
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Oversight - The sudden increase of homeowner policy terminations in coastal areas of New York City

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the New York State Legislature to pass legislation that would lower the percentage of homeowners’ insurance policies that a company may cancel or refuse to renew without the approval of the New York State Insurance Department.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: NYS Legislature to pass legislation that would lower the percentage of homeowners’ insurance policies that a company may cancel or refuse to renew without the approval of the NYS Insurance Department.
